content: The Nobel Prizes are awarded annually in several categories, including Physics, Chemistry, Medicine, Literature, Peace, and which other field established in 1968?

The Nobel Prizes are indeed awarded annually in several categories, and you've mentioned most of them: Physics, Chemistry, Medicine, Literature, and Peace. The additional field that was established in 1968 is Economics. It's officially known as the Sveriges Riksbank Prize in Economic Sciences in Memory of Alfred Nobel. Although it was established later than the original Nobel Prizes, it is commonly referred to as the Nobel Prize in Economics.
